thread.title: BRIEF-Tetra Technologies Signs Agreement To Acquire Swiftwater Energy Services

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tetra Technologies Signs Agreement To Acquire Swiftwater Energy Services

organizations.name: brief-tetra technologies signs agreement to acquire swiftwater energy services

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Tetra Technologies Inc:
* SIGNS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE SWIFTWATER ENERGY SERVICES, EXPAND ITS WATER MANAGEMENT PORTFOLIO AND PERMIAN BASIN FOOTPRINT
* SIGNS AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE SWIFTWATER ENERGY SERVICES, EXPAND ITS WATER MANAGEMENT PORTFOLIO AND PERMIAN BASIN FOOTPRINT
* DEAL FOR CONSIDERATION OF $40 MILLION OF CASH, 7.8 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK WILL BE PAID BY CO AT CLOSING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
